title: Naturopathic Nutrition - Your Energy Nutrition
description: Naturopathic nutrition - a patient centred approach to healthcare - work on underlying causes of illness with the healing power of nature.
cleaned_text: Why Naturopathic Nutritional Therapy Naturopathic nutrition does not treat disease or aim to suppress symptoms. Instead it is a patient centred approach to healthcare where the practitioner seeks to identify and remove underlying causes of illness. When assessing a person's health problems, a therapist in naturopathic nutrition takes into account the person as a whole including their physical, mental, spiritual and emotional well-being. They acknowledge the healing power of nature. Do you ever experience.... - Difficulty waking in the morning, night-time waking or a struggle to go to sleep - Unexplained fatigue or energy slumps - Impaired cognitive ability - Frequent colds and infections - Inability to maintain your ideal weight - Persistent aches and pains - Digestive discomfort such as bloating, gas, heartburn, constipation or diarrhoea or suspected food intolerances - Skin conditions like acne, eczema, rosacea or dry skin - Low mood, irritability, anxiety, inability to cope with stress and depression - Any health issue you haven't been able to resolve If so, using the principles of naturopathic nutritional therapy, Kelly can help you uncover the root cause of your health concerns.
